column1: 나는 코가 뾰족해. $I have pointy nose. $

column2: but it doesn't have enough room in the trunk. $

column1: 나한테 뭐 먹으라고 하지 마. 내가 뭘 먹어야 되고 안 먹어야 되는지 아니까. $Don't tell me what to eat. I know what I have to eat and what I don't have to eat. $
